member.name: T:YoutubeExtractor.YoutubeParseException
member.summary:
The exception that is thrown when the YouTube page could not be parsed. This happens, when YouTube changes the structure of their page.
Please report when this exception happens at www.github.com/flagbug/YoutubeExtractor/issues
